page.title: 19Wolverhampton's Millenium
page.content:
In 1985,Wolverhampton is a thousand years old. It is celebrating. There are lots of things happening such as SHOP 'N FUN days in the Mander Centre with late night shopping. Buses are doing special runs using open top buses. There is a Caribbean Festival. There are bands,fashion shows,dancing displays,marching majorettes.There are mock battles,reminding us of local battles from historical times. It was also celebrated by a visit form HRH The Princess of Wales. She first visited a glass works in Brierley Hill and then came to Wolverhampton where she walked about. In spite of the rain crowds turned out to see her.
Rachel Evans and Kathryn Bate
***************************************
